#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long  long int ll;

int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    /* Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT */   
  ll l,flag=0,t,n,q,r,a[100000],ans,j,i,c,d,e,f,g,h;
  char x,s[100000];
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        {
        c=0;
        d=0;
        e=0;
        f=0;
        g=0;
        h=0;
        cin>>s;
    l=strlen(s);
        flag=0;
        for(i=0;i<l;i++)
       {
            if(s[i]=='{')
                c++;
            else if(s[i]=='}')
                d++;
            else if(s[i]=='(')
                e++;
            else if(s[i]==')')
                f++;
            else if(s[i]=='[')
                g++;
            else if(s[i]==']')
                h++;
            if(d>c||f>e||h>g)
        {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
                }
        if(flag==1)
            cout<<"no\n";
        else 
            cout<<"yes\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
